About.title: About
About.description: .NET Backend/Fullstack Developer specializing in Clean Architecture and CQRS patterns

intro.title: Overview
intro.description: I'm a .NET Developer with a strong focus on Backend Development, experienced in building web systems using Clean Architecture and CQRS patterns. I'm particularly interested in designing systems that are scalable, maintainable, and performance-optimized.

achievements: Built backend with ASP.NET Core 8.0, Clean Architecture, and CQRS using MediatR
Implemented Next.js frontend with full authentication and role-based authorization (Admin/Customer)
Developed comprehensive reporting system with Excel and PDF export capabilities
Implemented server-side filtering, pagination, and sorting for optimal performance
Implemented CQRS pattern with Repository pattern
Developed secure authentication flow with Refresh Token mechanism
Integrated ASP.NET Identity for user management
Designed and implemented ASP.NET Core 8 API with Clean Architecture
Created scalable, maintainable structure ready for feature expansion
Focused on architectural best practices and code quality

institutions.name: Software Engineering
institutions.description: Self-taught through building production systems and practical projects.

skills.title: Backend & System Architecture
skills.description: ASP.NET Core 8.0 · Clean Architecture · CQRS (MediatR) · Entity Framework Core · ASP.NET Identity · JWT Authentication (Access & Refresh Token) · FluentValidation · AutoMapper · Serilog · SignalR · RESTful API Design

skills.title: Frontend & Modern Web
skills.description: Next.js (App Router) · React · TypeScript · SWR · Tailwind CSS · Shadcn UI · Zod · Axios · Server-side data fetching

skills.title: Tools & Development
skills.description: Docker · Excel/PDF Export · WinForms (.NET 8) · Git · Server-side filtering/pagination/sorting · Performance optimization
